item.title: [Rs2][SRL]Arr0w's Autofighter[SRL][Rs2]
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

how much RAM does your pc have??

EDIT if you have low RAM and your pc lags… it makes SCAR mess up and kinda get confused
… a good way to test if its your RAM is if when the Rs screen is lagging Hit Ctrl+Alt+A to pause the scar script…(the rs screen should unlag, if it does unlag then your best to get Bigger RAM

P.s Nice script Arr0w

Read full topic

item.title: [Rs2][SRL]Arr0w's Autofighter[SRL][Rs2]
item.dc:creator: @thunderwolf thunderwolf
item.description:
@thunderwolf wrote:

First, thanks for your hard work.

It works pretty good for me, however, after about a monster or 2 the script starts to freak out and the mouse cursor goes from monster to monster name ( in the upper left hand corner) back to monster, back to monster name. It does the very fast. It will find a new monster but I’m worried about the mouse movement. I tried it on Pyrefiends with SRL 3.5.

I tried to take monstername out of the script in line 49 so it didn’t look for that but then I recieved an invalid parameter error. Haven’t looked into it more yet to fix that.

Read full topic
